titleStmt.title: A discourse on fornication shewing the greatness of that sin, and examining the excuses pleaded for it, from the examples of antient times : to which is added an appendix concerning concubinage : as also a remark on Mr. Butler's explication of Hebr. xiii, 4 in his late book on that subject / by J. Turner ...
titleStmt.author: Turner, John, b. 1649 or 50.

notesStmt.note: Remarks on J. Butler's The true state of the case.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Imperfect: filmed copy lacks last 2 pages.
